MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: The drake's innate casting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: friends, vicious mockery 5/day each: calm emotions, dissonant whispers, ray of sickness, hideous laughter 3/day each: confusion, invisibility

MonsterTrait.Name: Forgetful Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: When a creature fails an Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma saving throw against a spell cast by an alehouse drake, the creature immediately forgets the source of the spellcasting.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Claw
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
MonsterTrait.Text: An alehouse drake can burp a cloud of intoxicating gas in a 15-foot cone. A creature caught in the cloud becomes poisoned for 1 minute and must make a successful DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become stunned for 1d6 rounds.

MonsterTrait.Name: Discombobulating Touch
MonsterTrait.Text: An alehouse drake can make a touch attack that grants its target +3 to Dexterity-based skill checks and melee attacks but also induces confusion as per the spell. This effect lasts for 1d4 rounds. A successful DC 13 Charisma saving throw negates this effect.
